channel.title: CVE Feed for sonicdoe -- ced
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sonicdoe -- ced

item.title: CVE-2021-39131|2024-08-04T01:58:17.881Z -- sonicdoe -- ced
item.description: ced detects character encoding using Google’s compact_enc_det library. In ced v0.1.0, passing data types other than `Buffer` causes the Node.js process to crash. The problem has been patched in ced v1.0.0. As a workaround, before passing an argument to ced, verify it’s a `Buffer` using `Buffer.isBuffer(obj)`.
